articles.author: Deutsche Welle
articles.title: EU, US to 'immediately' start work on green subsidies deal - DW (English)
articles.description: US President Joe Biden and European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen touted a breakthrough in their transatlantic trade dispute over subsidies for the green economy, as well as the war in Ukraine.
articles.content: US President Joe Biden and European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen on Friday agreed to start negotiations that could allow European raw materials to be used as part of an American clean en… [+3141 chars]
